MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 8:18PM in the CH1 postcode area of Chester following reports of a safety concern on the overhead line network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:20PM on 9th February 2021.
